title: Long Time-to-Hire
problem: Technical positions remain open for months, slowing down project delivery and team productivity.
solution: Our pre-vetted talent pool and efficient screening process reduces time-to-hire by 60%.

title: Skills Mismatch
problem: Candidates look good on paper but lack the specific technical skills needed for the role.
solution: Comprehensive technical assessments and hands-on coding challenges ensure skill alignment.

title: High Salary Expectations
problem: Top technical talent demands salaries that exceed budget constraints.
solution: We provide market salary insights and help structure competitive compensation packages.

title: High Candidate Dropout
problem: Candidates accept offers elsewhere during lengthy interview processes.
solution: Streamlined interview process and candidate relationship management keeps top talent engaged.

title: Limited Talent Pool
problem: Difficulty finding candidates with niche technical skills or specific technology experience.
solution: Extensive network of specialized technical professionals across various technology stacks.

title: Cultural Fit Issues
problem: Technically qualified candidates don't integrate well with existing team dynamics.
solution: Thorough cultural assessment and team compatibility evaluation during screening process.
